title: SGT KNOTS Thermoplastic Textured Primoloc Cord Lock for Camping, Backpacking, Hunting and More (10 Pack, HotPink)
features: PRIMOLOC CORD LOCK - Our durable and versatile cord stoppers are designed for various indoor and outdoor applications, including camping, backpacking, job sites, hunting, boating, and more. Perfect for storing, organizing, and manipulating your cord and rope supplies on-the-go.

HIGH-QUALITY DELRIN - Made with industrial-strength Delrin, a specially-engineered thermoplastic also used in combustion engines. Delrin will not warp, crack, or lose shape under extreme temperatures, with a range of -50 to 150 degrees Fahrenheit. Toss a handful of our multi-purpose cord locks in your backpack or bug out bag to prepare for your next adventure.

VERSATILE APPLICATION - Our all-purpose utility rope locks are great for hundreds of different projects, including drawstrings, gear bundles, tension lines, tie-downs, crafting projects, and cable organizers. The stainless steel springs will hold their strength indefinitely. Will withstand dirt, rain, snow, saltwater, and mud for a tight and secure hold on paracord, twines, bungees, and ropes up to 1/4 inch.

SIZE and COLORS - SGT KNOTS cord locks measure 10mm x 7mm x 20mm. Choose from 20 available colors: Black, Blaze Orange, Bone, Chocolate, Clear, Cobalt, Hot Pink, Hunter Green, Kelly Green, Light Blue, Lime Green, Magenta, Navy Blue, Purple, Red, Silver, Teal, Turquoise, White, or Yellow.

VETERAN OWNED and OPERATED - Primoloc Cord Locks are made in the USA. Just like the Marine Corps, SGT KNOTS is committed to being the best of the best. We continue to live by the motto, Semper Fidelis—Always Faithful. Our loyalty to our customers is what makes us who we are, and the reason we continue to grow in popularity and product offerings. We promise to maintain the strength and consistency of our products. We also pass down our bulk savings to our customers.
description: From backpacks to bug-out bags, bootlaces to boating gear, SGT KNOTS Primoloc Cord Locks are here to keep your cords tight and your stuff secure. Whether you're camping, heading to school, or need a handy way to bundle and store your ropes and other gear, these heavy-duty cord locks are up to the task. Put them on jacket and hoodie drawstrings to keep them in place, use them as removable cord pulls on backpacks and other corded zippers, keep them on your kids' shoe laces for the right fit.

Made from Delrin, a specially-engineered thermoplastic used in a range of high-intensity industries—including combustion engines!—these cord locks are virtually indestructible and will last for years of everyday use without warping, cracking, or breaking. Stainless steel springs give way to 2-3 lbs. of force and never lose their grip, meaning your cord locks will stay in place and keep things tight or positioned exactly how you want them. They also stand up to moisture and temperatures ranging from -50 to over 150 degrees Fahrenheit, making them the perfect all-weather, all-purpose cord lock for all of your needs.

Not only are these cord locks truly all-purpose, but they also fit all styles and aesthetic sensibilities. We have 20 available colors—more colors than you can shake a cord at! All this, and the wide-opening mouth can accommodate a single cord up to 1/4" in diameter or two cords of 4mm. Sold in packs of 10, 25, 50, or 100. As with everything sold by SGT KNOTS—proud to be a veteran-owned business—these Primoloc Cord Locks are 100% backed by the SGT KNOTS guarantee.

Available colors: Black, Blaze Orange, Bone, Chocolate, Clear, Cobalt (Purple Blue), Hot Pink, Hunter, Kelly Green, Lime, Light Blue, Magenta, Navy, Purple, Red, Silver, Teal, Turquoise, White, Yellow
